title: Crashes on opening the game
body:
Hello, 

I was wondering if someone can help me out. I just finished downloading the new patch for LOL and when it was finished I pressed the play button and it crashes the game :(. I have restated and turned off my computer I have also tried a different region, but the issue continues. i cannot even get on to LOL i was hoping to play today :( let me know if this is a common issue or any thing i should be doing to fix it. 

Thank you,
Pyropirate

replies.body: I had the same issue as I queued for a ranked game. Fourteen minutes into the game, I disabled LOLReplay and it seemed to work for me. Good luck!
i wish this was the case but I cannot even get into the login.
Same here.  I've tried everything except completely reinstalling, Has anyone tried this yet?
i have, and no luck same issue cannot get past the launch screen
Darn... Riot gods please look down upon us Mac users and save us from boredom!!

Hey Grey Mooshies,

We are aware of an issue with the patcher that is affecting Mac users running OSX 10.6.8 .  We are currently investigating this issue to determine the root cause, and are hoping to push a hotfix out to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.  Unfortunately, I cannot provide any type of ETA at this time.

In the meantime however, some Mac users have reported some success by trying the steps in this thread: 

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3909987

I hope this helps!  We are working on resolving this asap!

Same prob
i reinstalled , didnt help now im trying a software update . Hopefully this works
back to iLOL?

Hey PyroPirate89!

I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing issues getting to the Log-in Screen!  Typically, something like this indicates a corruption with the latest patch, or the patcher itself.  To that end, please make sure to try every single step in the following Knowledge Base Article, which you can find here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21804747-Patcher-Problems

If you have tried every single step here, and are still experiencing issues, make sure that you submit a new ticket to Player Support, found here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a new ticket, make sure that you provide the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
use the "run as admin" and it should let you run the game without crashing everytime.

I have this exact same problem. As soon as I hit play the client just closes down.
Please fix this riot. I need my fix
I have this same exact Problemo. Re-installing does not work. Please fix this pronto! Do you know what happens when drug addicts are deprived of their fixes? -_- It's EGGzactly.... like that.
Foiled once again for owning that damned beautiful silver box with that damned apple on it!! Need my LoL fix quick meng! Bro! Riot dude, help!
The same thing is happening to me. I guess we have to wait like the EU. And of course Kennen becomes free the week I cant play :(
Same here! wtf is going on!?
same :D mac is down :*(
Likewise, please fix the mac client. Thanks.
Been having the exact same problem myself brotha,  hoping this is resolved soon.  Made me wanna cry when mine didnt work and my roomates did lol.  I also play on a mac.

this keeps happening to mac players it seems. i hope they fix this problem soon. after finishing the patch the LoL Client and LoL Launcher keeps crashing and doesn't even take me to the login screen. looks like i'm going to bed early and not playing LoL at all this evening. :C
Same is happening for me. I just downloaded the new patch on my mac and it crashes soon as I press play. :(
....... My only time of the day to play, and i cant. Riot plz fix the withdrawal symptoms are starting to appear
same here... using the mac beta and it just keeps crashing. I hope riot does something about soon :((
I'm on the Mac client and it's the same for me. I've reset my computer and still LoL quits every time I hit "Play"
